control_description: Check if any security group allows ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 or ::0/0 to the ports 22(SSH), 23(Telnet), 512 (Exec), 514 (Shell), 992 (TelnetS) and 3389(RDP).
risk: Security Groups & Medium & Security-Group allows inbound traffic for remote management protocol ports.
recommendation: Make sure to limit inbound traffic as strictly as possible.
